attributes.additional_details:
The United Nations was created to “save succeeding generations from the scourge of war”. Apparently. 

Since its creation, the United Nations has failed to deliver on this legal obligation to all global members. 

The people of the United Kingdom, through their elected government, will invoke Chapter VII of the United Nations Charter, to bring an end to the war in Israel/Palestine. 

The UN will deploy boots on the ground to ensure all sides maintain peace and stability.
attributes.background: We the people, demand that the United Kingdom Government invoke Chapter VII of the United Nations Charter, to bring an end to the war in Israel/Palestine through the deployment of a UN Peacekeeping Mission.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658302
